title: Security Policy
description: LegacyGuard Security Policy - Comprehensive overview of our security measures, encryption standards, and data protection practices.

commitment.title: Our Security Commitment
commitment.content: At LegacyGuard, security is not just a featureâ€”it's the foundation of everything we do. We understand that you're entrusting us with your most sensitive and personal information, and we've built our platform with bank-level security standards to protect it.

zeroKnowledge.title: 1. Zero-Knowledge Architecture
zeroKnowledge.introduction: Our most important security feature is our zero-knowledge architecture. This means:

features.title: Client-Side Encryption:
features.description: All encryption and decryption happens on your device, not on our servers

features.title: No Access:
features.description: We cannot read, access, or decrypt your documents, even if compelled by law

features.title: True Privacy:
features.description: Your data remains private even from LegacyGuard employees and administrators

features.title: End-to-End Security:
features.description: Data is encrypted before it leaves your device and remains encrypted in transit and storage

standards.title: AES-256-GCM:
standards.description: Military-grade encryption for all document content

standards.title: RSA-4096:
standards.description: Asymmetric encryption for key exchange and digital signatures

standards.title: Argon2:
standards.description: Memory-hard key derivation for additional security

practices.title: Unique Keys:
practices.description: Each document gets its own encryption key

practices.title: Key Derivation:
practices.description: Keys are derived from your master password and device-specific factors

practices.title: Secure Storage:
practices.description: Keys are never stored on our servers in plain text

practices.title: Recovery Keys:
practices.description: Secure backup and recovery mechanisms for account access

features.title: SOC 2 Type II:
features.description: Certified secure data centers with regular audits

features.title: EU Location:
features.description: Servers located within the European Union for GDPR compliance

features.title: Physical Security:
features.description: 24/7 monitoring, biometric access controls, and environmental controls

features.title: Redundancy:
features.description: Multiple data centers with automatic failover

measures.title: TLS 1.3:
measures.description: Latest transport layer security for all connections

measures.title: DDoS Protection:
measures.description: Advanced protection against distributed denial of service attacks

measures.title: WAF:
measures.description: Web Application Firewall to block malicious requests

measures.title: CDN Security:
measures.description: Content delivery network with built-in security features

practices.title: Security Audits:
practices.description: Regular third-party security audits and penetration testing

practices.title: Dependency Scanning:
practices.description: Automated scanning for known vulnerabilities in dependencies

practices.title: Code Review:
practices.description: All code changes reviewed by security-conscious developers

practices.title: Static Analysis:
practices.description: Automated tools to detect potential security issues

features.title: Multi-Factor Authentication:
features.description: Support for TOTP, SMS, and hardware security keys

features.title: Session Management:
features.description: Secure session handling with automatic timeouts

features.title: Brute Force Protection:
features.description: Rate limiting and account lockout mechanisms

features.title: Password Requirements:
features.description: Strong password policies and breach detection

principles.title: Minimal Collection:
principles.description: We only collect data necessary to provide our services

principles.title: No Tracking:
principles.description: We don't track your browsing behavior or create user profiles

principles.title: No Third-Party Tracking:
principles.description: We don't use third-party analytics or tracking services

policies.title: User Control:
policies.description: You control how long your data is retained

policies.title: Automatic Deletion:
policies.description: Inactive accounts are automatically cleaned up

policies.title: Export Rights:
policies.description: You can export your data at any time

incidentResponse.title: 6. Incident Response
incidentResponse.introduction: We have a comprehensive incident response plan that includes:

measures.title: 24/7 Monitoring:
measures.description: Continuous security monitoring and threat detection

measures.title: Rapid Response:
measures.description: Dedicated security team available around the clock

measures.title: User Notification:
measures.description: Prompt notification of any security incidents

measures.title: Transparency:
measures.description: Public disclosure of security incidents and our response

measures.title: Learning:
measures.description: Continuous improvement based on incident analysis

certifications.title: GDPR:
certifications.description: Full compliance with European data protection regulations

certifications.title: CCPA:
certifications.description: Compliance with California Consumer Privacy Act

certifications.title: Regular Audits:
certifications.description: Annual third-party security and compliance audits

userBestPractices.title: 8. Security Best Practices for Users
userBestPractices.introduction: While we provide enterprise-level security, your data security also depends on you:

practices.title: Strong Passwords:
practices.description: Use unique, complex passwords for your account

practices.title: Multi-Factor Authentication:
practices.description: Enable MFA for additional account protection

practices.title: Recovery Keys:
practices.description: Safely store your account recovery keys

practices.title: Device Security:
practices.description: Keep your devices updated and secure

practices.title: Phishing Awareness:
practices.description: Be cautious of suspicious emails or links

securityUpdates.title: 9. Security Updates & Maintenance
securityUpdates.introduction: We continuously improve our security posture through:

activities.title: Vulnerability Management:
activities.description: Proactive identification and remediation of security issues

activities.title: Security Training:
activities.description: Ongoing security training for all employees

activities.title: Industry Collaboration:
activities.description: Participation in security research and information sharing

contact.title: 10. Contact Our Security Team
contact.introduction: If you have security concerns or want to report a security issue:
contact.bugBounty: Bug Bounty: We welcome security researchers and offer rewards for valid security findings
contact.responseTime: Response Time: We aim to respond to all security reports within 24 hours
